short_summary: Aircraft Tow Tractors Electric Motor Driven
description: Requested six (6) (six) Aircraft Tow Tractors Electric Motor Driven. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any future procurement.
full_summary:
# Air Tractor Request for Information

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: PW-23-01022868
* Solicitation Number: W8476-236688/A
* Publication Date: January 25, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 22, 2023 (14:00:00)
* Amendment Date: February 10, 2023
* Tender Status: Expiré

## Procurement Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Information (RFI) to inform and solicit industry feedback on the upcoming procurement process for the requirement to procure six (6) Aircraft Tow Tractors Electric Motor Driven.

## End User Entity

* Name: Department of National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

## Contract Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: None

## Contact Details

* Name: Roxanne Grenier
* Email: [ Roxanne.Grenier@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Roxanne.Grenier@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: 45 Boul. Sacré-Cœur, Gatineau QC J8X 1C6, Canada

## Documentation

* RFI Document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/900209fc9386f2963b69b05877f2a0f4/en_rfi_w8476-236688-aoriginal.pdf>
* Amendment: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/10/2978c7b689b5e885dfb11077263d0790/en_rfi_w8476-236688-aamendment_001.pdf>

## Purpose and Objective

The purpose of this RFI is to provide an opportunity for industry to comment on the upcoming procurement process and to inform the DND on the following:

* Suppliers' perspectives and advice on the procurement process
* Industry feedback on the requirement specifications
* Suppliers' potential interest in bidding on the requirement

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Note: I have rewritten and rephrased the original text to make it more professional and concise, while removing unnecessary information. I have also reformatted the text to use markdown formatting for
